mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_commodity(f_name, f_code, f_supplier_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{code}, #{supplierId});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_commodity SET f_name=#{name}, f_code=#{code}, f_supplier_id=#{supplierId} WHERE f_id=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT f_id as id, f_name as name, f_code as code, f_supplier_id as supplierId from t_commodity
